Metadata.title: Sony Game Changers
Metadata.description: Empower your team with performance management tools designed to drive growth, track ambitions, and foster continuous development.

Pages.gameChangersCheckInsDescription: Track your regular check-ins and progress updates.
Pages.gameChangersFeedbackDescription: Give and receive feedback to support continuous improvement.
Pages.gameChangersPerformanceReviewsDescriptio: Manage and review performance evaluations and career development.
Pages.gameChangersTalentPlanningDescription: Plan and develop talent strategies for team growth and succession.

Goals.title: Your Team Ambitions
Goals.description: This is the place for an amazing section description.

active.title: No Ambitions yet.
active.description: Create an Ambition to begin tracking your progress.

drafts.title: No draft Ambitions.
drafts.description: Save an Ambition as draft to continue editing later.

archived.title: No archived Ambitions.
archived.description: Any Ambitions you archive will appear here.

CreateGoal.title: New Ambition
CreateGoal.description: Create a new ambition for your team
CreateGoal.setupDescription: Define the type, assignee, and privacy level for this Ambition.
CreateGoal.contentDescription: Use the AAA framework (Ambition, actions, and achievements) to set goals and measure impact.

privacy.label: Privacy
privacy.helperPrivate: Private Ambitions are only visible to the owner, their manager, and anyone you've granted permission to below.

planActions.label: Actions:
planActions.description: Define the steps, resources, and timeline needed to achieve your Ambition.
planActions.subDescription: This list of activities and values drives your work toward a successful completion.
planActions.error: At least one action is required

achievements.label: Achievements:
achievements.description: Define the measurable outcomes that confirm your Ambition has been met.
achievements.subDescription: These quantifiable results serve as direct evidence that you've successfully fulfilled your goals.
achievements.error: At least one achievement is required

toast.draftRequiresName: Please enter an ambition name to save as draft
toast.draftSaveError: Failed to save draft. Please try again.

EditGoal.title: Edit Ambition
EditGoal.setupDescription: Update the type, assignee, and privacy level for this Ambition.
EditGoal.contentDescription: Update the AAA framework (Ambition, actions, and achievements) for this goal.

toast.errorMessage: Failed to update ambition. Please try again.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

Error.title: Something went wrong
Error.description: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.

emptyState.title: No Actions defined.
emptyState.description: Define the specific steps you'll take to achieve this Ambition. Edit the details to add them.

emptyState.title: No Achievements yet.
emptyState.description: List the expected results or milestones for this Ambition. Edit the details to add them.

emptyState.title: No laddered ambitions yet
emptyState.description: Connect ambitions from your team members to track their alignment with this ambition.

sendForApproval.title: Send for Approval Ambition
sendForApproval.description: You can add an optional comment to provide more context about your Ambition.
sendForApproval.errorMessage: Failed to send ambition for approval. Please try again.

archive.title: Archive Ambition?
archive.description: If you archive this Ambition, all associated laddered Ambitions will also be archived. You can find them in your archive and restore them to Draft status at any time.
archive.errorMessage: Failed to archive ambition. Please try again.

unarchive.errorMessage: Failed to restore ambition. Please try again.

sendBack.title: Send back Ambition
sendBack.description: You can share what needs to be adjusted. Your Feedback helps the employee refine their Ambition.
sendBack.errorMessage: Failed to send ambition back. Please try again.

approve.title: Approve Ambition
approve.description: You can leave a comment for the employee to provide more context about this approval.
approve.errorMessage: Failed to approve ambition. Please try again.
